chapter.title: Optional Exercise: Make toolbar visible dependent on the perspective

section.title: Target of this exercise
section.para: In this exercise you develop a model add-on which allows to define that a toolbar is only visible in a certain perspective. If no tag is set, it is always visible. If a tag is set, it must identify the perspectives for which it is valid via model tags.

section.title: Creating a new class for the model add-on
section.para: Create the following new class for the model add-on.

section.title: Registering your add-on with the application model
section.para: In your application model add a new model add-on with a reference to the new class.

section.title: Tagging a toolbar
section.para: In your application model tag at least one of your toolbars with the prefix "perspective:" followed by the ID of one of your perspectives.

section.title: Verifying the model add-on
section.para: Start your application. Verify that the toolbar tagged for a certain perspective is only visible if you have selected the corresponding perspective.
